text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I underestimated how stressful it'd be to partner with you, 
Fuji-san. I had no idea it'd attract this much attention.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I think you were aware from the beginning. 
It's just that, compared to the risk, 
The compromise I offered was that much sweeter.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I will keep that promise, you can hold me to that. In the days 
leading up to the dance, I'll make sure it won't impede on your 
training. So you can relax and attend lessons with me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Alright, now that we've finished showing off our new outfits, 
Why don't we test them out with a lesson?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
To start with, let's get you used to dancing in a pair. 
In school, most of the lessons you get are for winning lives.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
What's different here is, of course, that you have a partner. 
There's a key to getting it right, can you tell me what it is?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… 
How about not stepping on your partner's tail?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Well, you have the gist of it? Basically, the idea is that you 
align your breathing with your partner.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
For now, you can just focus on that. I'll take the lead. I've 
thought about the framework already, so why don't we try it out?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: One, two, three, four… One, two, three, four…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Can you lean into me a little more? 
Good, that's it. Just trust me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Follow me, Sky.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Um…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Very good! I was surprised how quickly you kept 
up with me. You know, if you trust me just a 
little more, it'll be easier to dance.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Are we using this choreography in the real deal too? 
The style and music are both very classical.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
We're performing in the exhibition. 
Our job is to create a fun atmosphere for everyone to dance in.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I've danced before with the other dorm mother to set an example. 
When the other students saw us doing such a fancy waltz… 
…they all got very excited!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh, so that's it…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Um, it's just…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Sky, we need to be synchronized. 
So tell me everything.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's nothing that important. 
I was just thinking, that's unexpectedly normal.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: By that you mean?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
That the flashiness of a party definitely fits you. 
It's something you're good at that makes you stand out.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The thing is… you know. I don't know a whole lot about the Droite. So we can go with whatever you think is best.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What can I do to make it more fun for you?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I'm pretty clueless when it comes 
to dancing, so I don't know…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Do you want me to lift you? 
Or maybe I could spin you around?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Those are all standard moves for you, Fuji-san. 
But I don't think it being fun is necessary in the first place.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Then what if we both do a nice, sharp turn? We can match the 
angle and speed of the turn, and be in perfect sync!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Actually, it might be better if we aren't in sync.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Like if we each do different, individual moves, 
And when the energy peaks, we snap back in sync. 
Something like that?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's not like we can become perfect partners in 
a matter of days. So I thought it might work better 
if we went for the surprise angle instead.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Interesting.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Just… hypothetically, you know! It's a lot easier 
said than done. I realized from rehearsing just 
now, how my reflexes are a lot slower.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I'm not the type of person who opens up that easily. So I 
don't want to set obstacles for myself. I'll focus on the basics…
(knock knock…)

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh? …Uh oh.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Wow, is that a care package from Spe-chan and the others? 
Good for you!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Was this your idea? I mean, it's hardly a secret that I'm appearing in the Droite…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Some of them are weirdly excited for it, another is 
mad at me for some reason, and another handed me stuff 
in a pro-wrestling mask. And on top of that…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Basically, you concocted a plan and convinced my friends, all to 
cut off my escape route.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I didn't concoct anything! This is just proof of how popular you 
are. Besides, are you going to tell you didn't know… that your 
friends are the key to motivating you?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: So what did they say? Will they be coming to the dance?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Unfortunately, it looks like they are. 
My entire class is going. What is this, a festival?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Is that so? 
I'm glad.
